comment: Remove from ~ rexcom4b dependency on ~ ax-ext and ~ ax-13 (and on ~ df-or , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ). The hypothesis uses ` V ` instead of ` _V ` (see ~ bj-isseti for the motivation). Use ~ bj-rexcom4bv instead when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
